title: Mars in Taurus
summary: Energy is steady and persistent. Action favors tangible results, patience, and consistency over speed. The opportunity is to build momentum slowly and stick with what you start.

meaning.headline: Drive moves deliberately toward practical outcomes.

frames.text: Mars in Taurus supports endurance, reliability, and work that accumulates over time.
Motivation increases when effort leads to security or tangible comfort.
Resistance to change can be strength when protecting what matters.
Steady pace equals stubbornness or laziness.

frictions: Holding onto tasks past their value
Ignoring urgency until it piles up
opportunities: Working through tasks that need patience

do: Use tactile rewards to stay engaged.
Stick with one task until a milestone is reached.
Check in on whether resistance is protective or avoidant.
Maintain your body with stretching and rest.
avoid: Staying stuck out of sheer habit

reusable_lines.text: Slow, steady effort can make today’s progress stick.
Protect your pace, and keep moving.

forbidden_claims: Promises that patience prevents all problems
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can build endurance and follow-through
Agency-forward language: you choose what deserves sustained effort
Contextual framing: steadiness helps when tasks are prioritized

sources: Mars as drive/assertion archetype in daily cycles
